verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a statement to NJ Advance Media] , [ARG0: Fox News] [V: apologized] [ARG1: for an error in its coverage of the Eagles ' White House visit , which was scheduled for Tuesday , June 5 , 2018 ( 6/5/18 ) but was canceled by President Donald Trump with less than 24 hours notice] .

In a statement to NJ Advance Media , Fox News apologized for an error in its coverage of the Eagles ' White House visit , which [V: was] scheduled for Tuesday , June 5 , 2018 ( 6/5/18 ) but was canceled by President Donald Trump with less than 24 hours notice .
